local: 运行长度\形态.hpp文件参考

origin: "black box" representation of the file storage associated with a file on disk.
local: “黑盒”表示与磁盘上的文件相关联的文件存储。

origin: Creates a run-length encoded image from a vector of runs (column begin, column end, row)
local: 从运行向量（列开始、列结束、行）创建运行长度编码图像

origin: (InputArray rlSrc, OutputArray rlDest, InputArray rlKernel, Point anchor=Point(0, 0))
Dilates an run-length encoded binary image by using a specific structuring element.
local: 通过使用特定的结构元素来扩展运行长度编码的二值图像。

origin: (InputArray rlSrc, OutputArray rlDest, InputArray rlKernel, bool bBoundaryOn=true, Point anchor=Point(0, 0))
Erodes an run-length encoded binary image by using a specific structuring element.
local: 通过使用特定的结构元素腐蚀运行长度编码的二值图像。

origin: Returns a run length encoded structuring element of the specified size and shape.
local: 返回指定大小和形状的运行长度编码结构元素。

origin: Check whether a custom made structuring element can be used with run length morphological operations. (It must consist of a continuous array of single runs per row)
local: 检查定制的结构元素是否可以用于运行长度形态学操作(它必须由每行单个运行的连续数组组成）

origin: (InputArray rlSrc, OutputArray rlDest, int op, InputArray rlKernel, bool bBoundaryOnForErosion=true, Point anchor=Point(0, 0))
local: （InputArray rlSrc，OutputArray rlDest，int op，InputArray rlKernel，bool bBoundaryOnForErosion=true，Point anchor=Point（0，0））

origin: Applies a morphological operation to a run-length encoded binary image.
local: 对运行长度编码的二值图像应用形态学操作。

origin: Paint run length encoded binary image into an image.
local: 将运行长度编码的二值图像绘制成图像。

origin: (InputArray src, OutputArray rlDest, double thresh, int type)
local: （输入数组src，输出数组rlDest，双阈值，int类型）

origin: Applies a fixed-level threshold to each array element.
local: 对每个数组元素应用固定级别的阈值。
